subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Rainbow}} [[File:Double-alaskan-rainbow.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|虹}} (''niji'', ''nuji'', ''noji''): a '''[[rainbow]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|にじ}} {{IPAfont|⟨nizi⟩}} → {{IPAchar|/niʑi/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=にじ|-}},{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}} attested as man'yōgana form {{m|ja||爾之}} in the {{m|ja||和名類聚抄|tr={{w|Wamyō Ruijushō}}}} of c.931-938 and {{m|ja||爾自}} in the {{m|ja||金光明最勝王経音義|tr=Konkōmyō Saishōō-kyō Ongi}} of 1079. May be a shift from earlier ''nuji'' or ''noji'' readings (see below).
